thread.section_title: Hotel de Londres Eiffel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Such a beautiful little place
thread.title_full: Such a beautiful little place - Review of Hotel de Londres Eiffel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Brendan C
title: Such a beautiful little place
text: Tucked away steps from the Eiffel Tower and a bunch of fabulous restaurants, yet tucked away on an unassuming side street. Our room had a beautiful double window that opened to the street. We also wanted to have a picnic at the Eiffel Tower and asked for a blanket... they went above and beyond and provided us with a little basket with a knife and blanket and cups. Perfect and unexpected!
